description: Mix up delicious shakes with the Blender Bottle Classic with Loop 32-oz. SportMixer in Black. Choose your own ingredients, drop in the blender ball and start shaking. The movement of the ball creates smooth, lump-free shakes every time. The bottle fits into most cup holders and the leak-proof lid won't make a mess in your car.
title: BlenderBottle® Classic 32oz Water Bottle
bullet_description: Style and color assortment may vary

description: Whether you want to mix your protein powder for your workout or carry water with you to stay hydrated, this Shake & Go Fit Tritan 28-Ounce Portable Drinkware Water Bottle from Contigo is perfect for all your nutrition needs. This plastic water bottle comes with a small loop that makes it carry or clip on to anything, while the wide opening makes it easy to clean and sip while your working out at the gym or playing sports with friends.
title: Contigo Shake & Go Fit Tritan 28oz Portable Drinkware Water Bottle

bullets: Mixing protein powders is easy with this plastic water bottle
Portable water bottle holds 28oz so you can have carry your cold beverage with you
Features a wide opening for hassle-free cleaning and easy drinking
soft_bullets.title: highlights

description: This MixerMate Bottle from Rubbermaid is a perfect addition to any kitchen. Useful for mixing salad dressing, powdered drinks and lemonade or storing cold drinks, this versatile plastic bottle will make you wonder how you ever lived without it. Made out of plastic with a plastic lid, this mixing bottle fits in many refrigerator doors and cabinets.
title: Rubbermaid® MixerMate Bottle - 2qt

bullets: Ergonomic grip makes bottle easy to handle
Great for mixing drinks of all kinds
Easily fits in your refrigerator or cabinets
soft_bullets.title: highlights

description: Maintain proper nutrition on the go with the BlenderBottle® SportMixer®. Featuring the BlenderBall® wire whisk, the SportMixer does double duty as a water bottle and shaker cup, allowing you to mix protein, nutrition, and meal replacement shakes anytime, anywhere.To mix up a smooth, lump-free shake, simply add your ingredients, drop in the BlenderBall, and shake. The BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle, mixing your drinks to a smooth consistency, every time. Made of 316 surgical-grade stainless steel, the BlenderBall is designed to remain in the bottle until you've enjoyed its contents. Just drinking water? Feel free to leave the ball inside - it'll never rust, chip, or peel.The SportMixer's BPA-free Eastman Tritan plastic is stain and odor resistant, allowing you to enjoy today's smoothie without tasting last week's protein shake. Other design elements include a unique SportLoop for easy carrying, and rubberized over molding on the lid for a firm hold.Designed with equal parts style, innovation, and versatility, the BlenderBottle SportMixer rises to the challenge of your active and busy lifestyle.
title: BlenderBottle® Portable Drinkware Bottle Cobalt - 20oz
bullet_description: Care and Cleaning: Dishwasher-safe top rack only, Hand wash, Clean with Water and mild Soap

description: The BlenderBottle® Classic revolutionized the industry back in 2004 with its leak-proof seal, iconic design, and the BlenderBall® wire whisk. Now, years later, it's still the best-selling portable mixer on the market. Why? Because it works.Mix up smooth, lump-free shakes by simply adding your ingredients, dropping in the BlenderBall, and shaking. The BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle, mixing your drinks to a smooth consistency, every time. Made of 316 surgical-grade stainless steel, the BlenderBall is designed to remain in the bottle until you've enjoyed its contents. Just drinking water? Feel free to leave the ball inside - it'll never rust, chip, or peel.The BlenderBottle Classic features a wide mouth opening, embossed ounce and milliliter markings, and fits in most cup holders for added convenience.
title: BlenderBottle® 32oz Classic Water Bottle - Black
bullet_description: Care and Cleaning: Dishwasher-safe top rack only, Clean with Water and mild Soap

description:
- Perfect for mixing Gatorade protein powder shakes and more
- 28-ounce capacity; marked measurements on the bottle go to 20 ounces
- Patented mixing system uses 316 surgical-grade stainless steel BlenderBall found only in BlenderBottle brand shaker cups
- Secure screw-on lid, a wide mouth for easy mixing, loop top, ergonomic flip cap, and tapered spout
- Dishwasher safe, BPA- and phthalate-free

Shake up your recovery with the Gatorade protein Blender Bottle - the perfect companion for on-the-go use to and from the gym, the field or wherever you may work up a sweat. The updated BlenderBottle adds a new, convenient carrying loop and flip cap design to the world’s best-selling shaker cup. The BlenderBall wire whisk moves freely inside the bottle as you shake, mixing even the thickest ingredients with ease. The BlenderBottle Classic features a secure screw-on lid, a wide mouth for easy mixing, and embossed markings that measure both ounces and milliliters. The BlenderBottle Classic is dishwasher safe, BPA- and phthalate-free . Perfect for mixing and enjoying your favorite flavor of Gatorade Recover protein shakes.
title: Gatorade® BlenderBottle® 28oz Shaker Bottle - Clear/Orange
bullet_description: Care and Cleaning: Clean with Water and mild Soap

description: Carry supplements, snacks, pills and more-all in the same bottle. The BlenderBottle® ProStak® is the ultimate all-in-one shaker cup, offering a variety of features to make on-the-go nutrition easier than ever.Like all BlenderBottle® brand shaker cups, the ProStak utilizes the BlenderBall® wire whisk to deliver smooth, great-tasting drinks. Simply add your ingredients, drop in the BlenderBall, and shake. The BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle as you shake, mixing drinks to a smooth consistency, every time.Not quite ready to mix your shake? Need to pack an extra snack for later in the day? The ProStak's unique Twist n' Lock storage jar easily attaches and detaches from to the bottom of the bottle, offering compact storage that's available right when you need it.The ProStak also features a unique, space-saving pill tray that locks into the jar lid, allowing you to carry both vitamins and powders in the same bottle.The BlenderBottle ProStak features a wide mouth opening, embossed ounce and milliliter markings, and a patent-pending carry loop for added portability.
title: BlenderBottle® ProStak 22oz Water Bottle - Pink

description:
Maintain proper nutrition on the go with the BlenderBottle® SportMixer®. Featuring the BlenderBall® wire whisk, the SportMixer does double duty as a water bottle and shaker cup, allowing you to mix protein, nutrition, and meal replacement shakes anytime, anywhere.
To mix up a smooth, lump-free shake, simply add your ingredients, drop in the BlenderBall, and shake. The BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle, mixing your drinks to a smooth consistency, every time. Made of 316 surgical-grade stainless steel, the BlenderBall is designed to remain in the bottle until you've enjoyed its contents. Just drinking water? Feel free to leave the ball inside - it'll never rust, chip, or peel.
The SportMixer's BPA-free Eastman Tritan plastic is stain and odor resistant, allowing you to enjoy today's smoothie without tasting last week's protein shake. Other design elements include a unique SportLoop for easy carrying, and rubberized over molding on the lid and grip for a firm hold.
Designed with equal parts style, innovation, and versatility, the BlenderBottle SportMixer rises to the challenge of your active and busy lifestyle.

description: Boasting a heavier, more powerful 12-Gauge BlenderBall®, a rounded base, and a massive 45-ounce capacity, the BlenderBottle® Pro45 is built to go big.The Pro45's massive 45-ounce capacity fits virtually all mass gainer shakes, multiple scoops of a recovery drink, or enough water to keep you hydrated with minimal refills. Using the 50% heavier 12-Gauge BlenderBall®, the Pro45 powers through thicker, higher-volume shakes to ensure a smooth, great-tasting drink. BlenderBottle's patented mixing system is further improved in the Pro45 with the new rounded-base design. This elimination of corners at the bottom allows the BlenderBall to reach every last bit of powder with ease. It also features the SpoutGuard, which protects the drinking spout from dirty gym fingers.
title: BlenderBottle® Portable Drinkware Bottle Black - 28oz

description:
Maintain proper nutrition on the go with the BlenderBottle® SportMixer®. Featuring the BlenderBall® wire whisk, the SportMixer does double duty as a water bottle and shaker cup, allowing you to mix protein, nutrition, and meal replacement shakes anytime, anywhere.

To mix up a smooth, lump-free shake, simply add your ingredients, drop in the BlenderBall, and shake. The BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle, mixing your drinks to a smooth consistency, every time. Made of 316 surgical-grade stainless steel, the BlenderBall is designed to remain in the bottle until you've enjoyed its contents. Just drinking water? Feel free to leave the ball inside - it'll never rust, chip, or peel.

The SportMixer’s BPA-free Eastman Tritan plastic is stain and odor resistant, allowing you to enjoy today’s smoothie without tasting last week’s protein shake. Other design elements include a unique SportLoop for easy carrying, and rubberized over molding on the lid and grip for a firm hold.

Designed with equal parts style, innovation, and versatility, the BlenderBottle SportMixer rises to the challenge of your active and busy lifestyle.

· 28 oz capacity

· Top-rack dishwasher safe

· BPA and Phthalate free

description:
Taste Your Shake, Not Your Shaker. The 22 oz. Shake & Go Fit Mixer Bottle with Storage Container from Contigo is designed with convenient features for those who see nutrition as a way of life. The rounded bottom and weighted shaker ball are engineered to work together for easy mixing and cleaning. The new storage container holds up to two servings of powder making it easy to transport on-the-go. This leak-proof bottle also features TasteGuard® Protection to help protect tastes and resist odors. The BPA-free bottle and lid are top-rack dishwasher safe for a convenient, complete clean.

Features & Benefits: 100% Leak-proof, TasteGuard® Protection, Storage container, Weighted shaker ball and rounded bottom, Convenient carrying handle, Top-rack dishwasher safe, 100% BPA-Free

description:
Taste Your Shake, Not Your Shaker. The 28 oz. Shake & Go Fit Mixer Bottle from Contigo has a uniquely designed rounded-bottom and weighted shaker ball that work together in order to easily and smoothly mix protein drinks and shakes. This 100 percent leak-proof mixer bottle is also engineered with TasteGuard® Protection to help protect tastes and resist odors. The rounded bottom makes clean up a a snap because it helps reduce clumps common in other bottles. This BPA-free bottle and lid are both top-rack dishwasher safe.

Other design elements include a unique SportLoop for easy carrying, and rubberized over molding on the lid for a firm hold.Designed with equal parts style, innovation, and versatility, the BlenderBottle SportMixer rises to the challenge of your active and busy lifestyle.

description: Maintain proper nutrition on the go with the BlenderBottle® SportMixer®. Featuring the BlenderBall® wire whisk, the SportMixer does double duty as a water bottle and shaker cup, allowing you to mix protein, nutrition, and meal replacement shakes anytime, anywhere.To mix up a smooth, lump-free shake, simply add your ingredients, drop in the BlenderBall, and shake. The BlenderBall whips around inside the bottle, mixing your drinks to a smooth consistency, every time. description: Boasting a heavier, more powerful 12-Gauge BlenderBall®, a rounded base, and a massive 45-ounce capacity, the BlenderBottle® Pro45 is built to go big.The Pro45's massive 45-ounce capacity fits virtually all mass gainer shakes, multiple scoops of a recovery drink, or enough water to keep you hydrated with minimal refills. Using the 50% heavier 12-Gauge BlenderBall®, the Pro45 powers through thicker, higher-volume shakes to ensure a smooth, great-tasting drink. BlenderBottle's patented mixing system is further improved in the Pro45 with the new rounded-base design. This elimination of corners at the bottom allows the BlenderBall to reach every last bit of powder with ease. It also features the SpoutGuard, which protects the drinking spout from dirty gym fingers.
title: BlenderBottle® Portable Drinkware Bottle Black - 28oz
